assessment_item.title: 11btu9q18-கோலங்கைமா என்பது
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

கோலங்கைமா என்பது                                         

 

                                

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

உணவு சேமிப்பற்றது மற்றும் உயிருள்ள செல்கள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1124"},{"text":"

புரோட்டோபிளாசமுடையது மற்றும் உயிருள்ள செல்கள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1139"},{"text":"

உணவு சேமிப்புடையது மற்றும் உயிரற்ற செல்கள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1638"},{"text":"

உள்ளீடற்ற மற்றும் உயிருள்ள செல்கள்ண்ட ஒரு செல்லாலானவை    

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2405"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"11btu9q18-கோலங்கைமா என்பது","title":"11btu9q18-கோலங்கைமா என்பது","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
